info.author: caijiajia
info.description:
#  脚本示例
cd /home/ec2-user/consultscripts/PrivateBankModel/workspace/

1. 计算组合比例
   pypy caijiajia/startup/mvo/market_portfolio_cal.py PROD test

2. 更新盈利概率
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/update_market_portfolio_profit_probability.py PROD test

3. 手动更新, 自动选11个组合点 从markowitz_line更新到market_portfolio
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/update_model_market_portfolio.py PROD test

4. 手动更新 TAA观点
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/taa_load_prediction.py PROD <filePath>

5. 手动更新 TAA观点业绩计算
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/taa_performance_cal.py PROD test

6. 手动更新 计算taa市场组合
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/taa_market_portfolio.py PROD test

7. 手动更新 产品组合
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/fund_portfolio_cal.py PROD

8. 更新组合收益率分布图
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/portfolio_profit_distribution_cal.py PROD test

9. 更新benchmark
   python caijiajia/startup/mvo/benchmark_profit_ratio_cal.py PROD test

10. 计算器
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD YEARLY_PROFIT INDEX 000300 DAILY 2013-01-01 2014-01-01
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD INTERVAL_VAR INDEX 000300 WEEKLY 2013-01-01 2014-01-01
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD INTERVAL_VAR PORTFOLIO 1 DAILY 2016-08-01 2017-01-01 MVO
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD INTERVAL_RETURN PORTFOLIO 1 MONTHLY 2016-08-01 2017-01-01 MVO
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD SHARPE FUND 000001 DAILY 2016-08-01 2017-01-01

11. caijiajia/script/run_mvo.sh 计算组合比例脚本,有详细说明. 人工执行

# 每日运行脚本
script/run.sh 每日1点任务
script/run_1440.sh 每日14点40任务


10. 计算器
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD YEARLY_PROFIT INDEX 000300 DAILY 2013-01-01 2014-01-01
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD INTERVAL_VAR INDEX 000300 WEEKLY 2013-01-01 2014-01-01
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD INTERVAL_VAR PORTFOLIO 1 DAILY 2016-08-01 2017-01-01 MVO
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD INTERVAL_RETURN PORTFOLIO 1 MONTHLY 2016-08-01 2017-01-01 MVO
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD SHARPE FUND 000001 DAILY 2016-08-01 2017-01-01
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD EXTRA_RETURN PORTFOLIO 1 MONTHLY 2016-08-01 2017-01-01 MVO 096001
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD BETA PORTFOLIO 1 WEEKLY 2017-01-01 2017-05-01 MVO 096001
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD ALPHA PORTFOLIO 1 WEEKLY 2017-01-01 2017-05-01 MVO 096001
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD IR PORTFOLIO 1 WEEKLY 2017-01-01 2017-05-01 MVO 096001
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD TREYNOR PORTFOLIO 1 WEEKLY 2017-01-01 2017-05-01 MVO 096001
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py PROD SORTINO PORTFOLIO 1 WEEKLY 2017-01-01 2017-05-01 MVO 096001
   python caijiajia/startup/base/calculator_indicator.py UAT MAXDOWN PORTFOLIO 1 WEEKLY 2017-01-01 2017-05-01 MVO


11. caijiajia/script/run_mvo.sh 计算组合比例脚本,有详细说明. 人工执行

12. 计算组合周收益的年化收益率，存入数据库(model_portfolio_nav)
    python caijiajia/startup/base/portfolio_yearly_return_calc_run.py PROD

# 每日运行脚本
script/run.sh 每日1点任务
script/run_1440.sh 每日14点40任务


# project structure
/script 启动脚本

/caijiajia 核心代码

    -- /configuration        配置参数模块
    -- /constant             常量模块
    -- /dao                  数据库DAO模块
    -- /fund                 基金相关的启动脚本模块
    -- /market               市场相关的启动脚本模块
    -- /offline_to_online    线下导入线上脚本模块
    -- /process              基金/市场业务处理模块
    -- /report               报表模块
    -- /threads              线程业务模块
    -- /utils                工具类
    -- /web                  web模块
    -- /wind                 wind数据读取模块
    -- config.ini           web配置文件/
    -- manage.py            web启动文件
    -- start.py             主任务入口

/docs   相关文档

/test   测试代码

requirements.txt 安装包列表

setup.py 安装文件
info.name: privateBankModel
